text: Gu nimen dang zhaijie you shu de ruogan ri. Nimen zhong youhai bing huo luxing de ren, dang yi suo que de rishu bu zhai. Nanyi zhaijie zhe, dang na fa shu, ji yi yi can fan, shi gei yige pinmin. Ziyuan xingshan zhe, bi huo geng duo de shan bao. Zhaijie dui yu nimen shi geng hao de, ruguo nimen zhidao.
